name: Arcadia (itch) (Wenrui)
description:
Arcadia is a game jam work, and the gameplay was inspired by the game jam theme: agricultural production and the ecological environment.

This year, some global information about reduced food production due to extreme weather has received many people’s attention, and we slowly realize that we are not facing the same environment and climate as in the past. Environmental problems may get worsen.

We hope that, through the unique expression of the game, more people will understand and perceive the relationship and balance between humanity and the environment.

Gameplay

Players are given initial crops at the start of the level, which can produce coins. They need to buy more seeds and protect the crops from extreme weather to accumulate enough coins within the required time to pass the level.
